availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Whitley County, KY. Born in Knox County, KY, son of Cornelius Gatliff and Sarah Langford. Married Caroline Early in Whitley County, KY, 26 August 1855. A farmer.

ab.bibl:
Cleland Edward Early, The Early Families of Knox and Whitley Counties, Kentucky (1988) (snippet view on google books)
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Whitley generally, p. 121.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records on Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Rolls #994027-994058, Whitley County Marriages, 26 Aug 1855, p. 5.
